mapper.insert: insert into inbound(inbound_no, customer_name, operator, status, actual_pay, should_pay) values (#{inboundNo},#{customerName},#{operator},#{status},#{actualPay},#{shouldPay})
mapper.update:
update inbound
customer_name=#{customerName},
operator=#{operator},
status=#{status},
actual_pay+=#{actualPay},
update_time=now()
mapper.delete: update inbound set is_delete=1 where id=#{id}
